Recorded Use of Books in the Yale Medical Library .A Kilgour, F.G. Explores the amount of use of books by categories of borrowers in the Yale Medical Library, with a view to discovering the proportion of the catalogue which should be put in machinable form. .X 31	1	36 33	2	36 36	7	36 41	2	36 46	2	36 57	1	36 89	1	36 90	1	36 97	1	36 102	1	36 111	1	36 112	1	36 161	1	36 163	1	36 181	1	36 182	1	36 183	4	36 184	5	36 185	1	36 193	4	36 195	2	36 198	2	36 199	2	36 201	4	36 202	1	36 203	4	36 204	2	36 205	2	36 209	1	36 210	1	36 211	1	36 212	1	36 217	2	36 220	2	36 222	1	36 225	1	36 233	1	36 267	1	36 269	3	36 284	1	36 286	1	36 294	1	36 359	1	36 373	1	36 395	2	36 415	1	36 543	1	36 545	1	36 552	1	36 587	2	36 588	1	36 605	1	36 613	2	36 614	1	36 624	1	36 638	1	36 667	1	36 735	1	36 747	1	36 748	1	36 750	2	36 751	1	36 753	1	36 759	1	36 760	1	36 765	1	36 766	1	36 767	3	36 774	1	36 775	1	36 778	2	36 782	1	36 784	1	36 787	1	36 788	1	36 789	1	36 791	1	36 792	1	36 793	2	36 799	1	36 800	3	36 808	2	36 891	2	36 905	2	36 952	1	36 953	2	36 959	1	36 964	1	36 968	1	36 977	1	36 983	1	36 1009	1	36 1016	1	36 1018	1	36 1019	1	36 1023	1	36 1030	1	36 1055	1	36 1081	1	36 1082	1	36 1083	1	36 1085	1	36 1086	1	36 1087	1	36 1090	1	36 1135	1	36 1151	1	36 1201	1	36 1240	1	36 1260	1	36 1275	2	36 1276	1	36 1278	2	36 1280	1	36 1285	1	36 1286	1	36 1287	1	36 1302	1	36 1335	1	36 1359	1	36 1390	1	36 1397	3	36 1401	1	36 1416	1	36 1417	3	36 1418	1	36 1428	1	36 1432	1	36 1432	1	36
